title: "A Novelist and an AI Cowrote Your Next Cringe-Read"
excerpt: "It was something of an accident. In 2020, I was invited by a friend to test a user interface she was developing for an AI program called GPT-3. I began experimenting and wrote my first book, Pharmako-AI, over a period of two weeks in the summer of 2020."
